direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve order management but perform opposite actions (creation vs. cancellation).
Both methods handle order cancellation, but cancelOpenOrders targets all open orders.
getOrder can be used to verify the state of an order before and after cancellation.
Both methods involve order cancellation but with additional actions in cancelReplace.

enhanced_by.reason: newOrder can be used to create an order that can then be canceled by cancelOrder.
getOrder can be used to verify the order status before cancellation.
getOrder can be used to verify the order status after cancellation.
